entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Québec

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 01:34 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain and fog. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain and fog changing to snow in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
